name: Click This.
description:
Made specifically for the GMKT Game Jam.

As an alien, you have captured multiple hostages. Of course, as some hostages might do, they will run. Click on them to stop them from running - ONLY WHEN THEY ARE RUNNING. We don't want to hurt the good hostages, right?

The quicker you take care of those who won't obey, the better the payment.

Not one of my best jams, but I will say it's done. Also you clicked on this, so I guess it works out.
